sentences.sContent: Large Wall Clock: so all can see when the stand-up will start or when meetings will reconvene.
sentences.sContent_eng: Large Wall Clock: so all can see when the stand-up will start or when meetings will reconvene.
sentences.sCn: 大型挂钟：通过它所有的人都能知道立会何时开始，或何时召集会议。

remMethod.val: re(重新) + convene(集会) → 再集会
